Package importedImplementations.SanguptaBloom.bloomfilter.impl

Class InMemoryBloomFilter<T>

java.lang.Object
importedImplementations.SanguptaBloom.bloomfilter.AbstractBloomFilter<T>
importedImplementations.SanguptaBloom.bloomfilter.impl.InMemoryBloomFilter<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of object to be stored in the filter
All Implemented Interfaces:
BloomFilter<T>
public class InMemoryBloomFilter<T> extends AbstractBloomFilter<T>
An in-memory implementation of the bloom filter. Not suitable for persistence.
Since:
1.0
Author:
sangupta
